mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.transfer_no AS "transferNo", a.from_inv AS "fromInv.id", fromInv.name AS "fromInv.name", a.to_inv AS "toInv.id", toInv.name AS "toInv.name", a.apply_id AS "applyer.id", apply.name AS "applyer.name", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.recv_eta AS "recvEta", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info fromInv ON fromInv.id = a.from_inv LEFT JOIN sys_office outCent ON outCent.id = fromInv.cust_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info toInv ON toInv.id = a.to_inv LEFT JOIN sys_office inCent ON inCent.id = toInv.cust_id LEFT JOIN sys_user apply ON apply.id = a.apply_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_sku_transfer( id, transfer_no, from_inv, to_inv, apply_id, biz_status, recv_eta, remark, create_time, create_id, u_version, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{transferNo}, #{fromInv.id}, #{toInv.id}, #{applyer.id}, #{bizStatus}, #{recvEta}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_sku_transfer SET transfer_no = #{transferNo} from_inv = #{fromInv.id}, to_inv = #{toInv.id}, apply_id = #{applyer.id}, biz_status = #{bizStatus}, recv_eta = #{recvEta}, remark = #{remark}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM biz_sku_transfer a LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info bii ON a.to_inv = bii.id WHERE bii.cust_id = (SELECT inv.cust_id FROM biz_inventory_info inv WHERE inv.id = #{invId})
